issue.title: [CF 1216] Combo point conditions not working (Legion)
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Make an icon with a condition to show if target has more than x combo points
2. Build some combo points
3. Icon will not show

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
The icon doesn't show up. Suspect this is because combo points in legion are on the rogue himself, and the combo point resource type is hardcoded to look at target.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.4.0-90-g5722601

Bonus information
Noted some erratic behaviour. When setting the number of combo points to look for to > 0 the icon will show up, but will never go away again, even if all combo points are spent.


> Posted by CurseForge user kdhiin | Imported from CurseForge issue #1216 | Raw

comments.body:
Just a changed event. UNIT_COMBO_POINTS is gone.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
